subject: Trades (Sports)
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Tampa Bay and Phoenix have completed a three-player trade with the Lighting, sending right wing Radim Vrbata to the Coyotes for left wing Todd Fedoruk and defenseman David Hale.
snippet: Tampa Bay and Phoenix have completed a three-player trade with the Lighting, sending right wing Radim Vrbata to the Coyotes for left wing Todd Fedoruk and defenseman David Hale.
